mapper.select: SELECT cate.*, truck.truck_name, truck.truck_addr, truck.truck_num FROM tb_cateconf cate, tb_truck truck WHERE cate.mem_id = #{mem_id} AND cate.truck_num = truck.truck_num
SELECT c.*, a.*,t.* FROM tb_adverconf c, tb_adver a, tb_truck t WHERE c.adv_num = a.adv_num AND t.truck_num = c.truck_num AND a.mem_id = #{mem_id} AND c.advconf_state not in( '거절' , '승인' )
SELECT c.*, a.*,t.* FROM tb_adverconf c, tb_adver a, tb_truck t WHERE c.adv_num = a.adv_num AND t.truck_num = c.truck_num AND a.mem_id = #{mem_id} AND c.advconf_state = '승인'

SELECT menu.*, truck.truck_name, truck.truck_addr FROM tb_member member, tb_truck truck, tb_menu menu WHERE member.mem_id = truck.mem_id AND truck.truck_num = menu.truck_num AND member.mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_menu SET menu_name = #{menu_name}, menu_content = #{menu_content}, menu_price = #{menu_price}, menu_cate = #{menu_cate} WHERE menu_num = #{menu_num}
